name: 黃馨瑩
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Tentative Schedule

Week 1	Orientation
Week 2	Unit 6—Give and Learn (RW)
Week 3	Unit 6—Give and Learn (RW)
Week 4	Unit 6—Giving to Others (LS)
Week 5	Unit 7—Homing in on Education (RW)
Week 6	Unit 7—Homing in on Education (RW)
Week 7	Unit 7—What's the Use of Homework? (RW)
Week 8	Review
Week 9	Midterm Project and Proficiency Test
Week 10	Unit 8—Eat to Live and Live to Eat? (RW)
Week 11	Unit 8—Eat to Live and Live to Eat? (RW)
Week 12	Unit 8—Goodbye to the Sit-down Meal (LS)
Week 13	Unit 9—The Grass is Always Greener (RW)
Week 14	Unit 9—Finding a Niche (LS)
Week 15	Unit 10—Take it or Leave it (RW)
Week 16	Unit 10—Take it or Leave it (RW)
Week 17	Unit 10—No Technology? No Way! (LS)
Week 18	Final Project and Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
1. Daily Performance: 25%
(a) Check-in Quiz - 10%
(b) Vocabulary Review Test- 5%
(c) Your attendance and participation - 10%
2. Assignments and Homework: 15%
3. Role-Play Dialogue: 6%
4. Course Projects: 24%
5. Campus-wide Proficiency Test: 30% (期中&期末會考各15%)
materials:
Northstar 4: Reading and Writing. 3rd Edition.
Northstar 4: Listening and Speaking. 3rd Edition.
